words.def: a person who professes beliefs and opinions that he or she does not hold in order to conceal his or her real feelings or motives
a compound used as a fixing agent in photographic developing
a range horse of the western United States
a flatbottom boat for carrying heavy loads (especially on canals)
A form of classical Japanese music drama.
distant but within sight (`yon' is dialectal)
a midwestern state in north central United States in the Great Lakes region
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
op Op art ; a style of abstract art.
